name: The Adventures of The Lost Spacesheep, Destroyer of Universes
name_original: The Adventures of The Lost Spacesheep, Destroyer of Universes
description:
SHOOT AT THINGS
ENTER THE VORTEX
DESTROY UNIVERSES
FIND HOME

Adventures of The Lost Spacesheep, Destroyer of Universes is a short shmup where you'll follow the long road through the multiverse that a Spacesheep has to travel to finally get home.

What's a Spacesheep you'll ask? Well, the only thing I can tell you is that it has nothing to do neither with space nor with sheep... or maybe it does... why you ask me?

On a serious note: The game has a lot of rapidly flashing high contrast colours. If you have any health problem that could be affected by stuff like that, I really suggest you to avoid playing this game.
